writing_prompt: When Arthur stumbles upon the scars Merlin has been hiding, he demands answers—but the truth behind them reveals more than either of them expected, leaving their bond forever changed.

A scruffy young raven, outcast by her kin, takes up residence in your chambers, much to the dismay of your court. But as the bird grows into a striking and mischievous companion, you realize she may be more than just a pet—she's family.

On the coldest night of the year, Merlin braves the frost to gather a rare herb, only to find himself summoned to Arthur's chambers. What begins as a simple scolding over his lack of winter gear turns into an unexpectedly tender moment by the fire.

When Bilbo Baggins left the Shire for his grand adventure, Lobelia Sackville-Baggins saw an opportunity to claim Bag End for herself. But when news of Bilbo's unexpected fate reaches Hobbiton, her plans—and her pride—are thrown into chaos.
